channel.title: How do I use my No-IP on my client? (742) *NEVERMIND*
channel.description:
How do I use my no-ip? I'm connecting with "127.0.0.1". I went into my client.java and I searched "Server =" and obtained no results. I also searched "no-ip" and "127.0.0.1" in the client, still with no results. So how do I change the IP to connect to my computer/server where I can host and have other people play alongside me in-game.
Found it in Loader.java on the client.

item.title: How do I use my No-IP on my client? (742) *NEVERMIND*
item.dc:creator: @Invader_Killer Invader Killer
item.description:

I also searched “no-ip” and “127.0.0.1” in the client, still with no results.
